G

game - package game
 
Game - Class in game
Class used for running major events in the poker game and interact with all the players of the game.
Game() - Constructor for class game.Game
A no argument constructor.
Game.BettingRound - Enum in game
The betting rounds in Texas hold'em.
Game.StateOfPlayers - Enum in game
The possible states the players as a group can have during the poker game.
gameFinished - Variable in class game.Game
Flag that indicates if the whole poker game is finished.
generateDeck() - Method in class game.Deck
Generates a deck where its cards are a linked list.
generateRandomNumbers() - Method in class game.Deck
Generates an array list with the numbers 0-51 placed in a random order.
getBestCardsSameRank(Card[], Card[], HandRank) - Method in class game.PokerRules
Method that compares two sets of cards with the same ranking and decides which one of the sets of cards is best.
getBlind() - Method in class player.Player
Get the blind of the player.
getCard1() - Method in class common.HoleCards
Get the first hole card.
getCard2() - Method in class common.HoleCards
Get the second hole card.
getCards() - Method in class common.Hand
Get the cards in the poker hand.
getChips() - Method in class player.Player
Get the number of chips the player has.
getChipsOnTable() - Method in class player.Player
Show the amount of chips the player currently has bet.
getHoleCards() - Method in class player.Player
 
getID() - Method in class player.Player
Get the ID of the player.
getMove() - Method in class player.Player
Get the move the player has chosen to make
getName() - Method in class player.Player
Get the players name.
getRank() - Method in class common.Card
Method which returns the rank of the card object.
getRank() - Method in class common.Hand
Get the ranking of the poker hand.
getReference() - Method in class common.Card
Method which returns the reference of the card object.
getState() - Method in class player.Player
Get the state the player is currently in (in, all in, fold or lost)
getSuit() - Method in class common.Card
Method which returns the suit of the card object.
getTopCard() - Method in class game.Deck
Returns the card at the top of the deck.
goAllIn(Player) - Method in class game.Game
Makes a player go all in.
